mapper.update: UPDATE CART SET PRODUCT_NUM=#{product_num}, CART_COUNT=#{cart_count} WHERE CART_NUM=#{cart_num}
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY c.cart_num DESC) AS num, c.cart_num, m.id, m.com_name, p.product_num, p.rate, p.product_price, p.product_name, c.cart_count, c.adddate, pf.filenum, pf.filename, pf.oriname, pf.filesection FROM CART c INNER JOIN product P ON c.product_num = p.product_num INNER JOIN productfile Pf ON pf.product_num = p.product_num INNER JOIN members M ON m.id = c.id WHERE c.id = #{id} AND pf.product_num = #{product_num}
SELECT * FROM CART WHERE ID = #{id} and PRODUCT_NUM=#{product_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (CART_NUM, PRODUCT_NUM, ID, CART_COUNT) VALUES(CART_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{product_num}, #{id}, #{cart_count})
